Detailed Description

template<typename T = void>
class Sylph::BoolConvertible< T >

Implementation of the Safe Bool Idiom.

This class allows a safe conversion to bool for use in if() and while() statements, without allowing an implicit conversion to bool in other statements. You should override toBool() instead of operator bool here.

Template requirements:
T The type of the derived class.
